name: Cat Wizards And Gobo Dragons!
description:
View project on Scratch

Instructions

========= Controls =========
Enter : Pause
Arrows : Move
Period : Commands
========= Commands =========
Command.Teleport.Random : Random Teleport
Command.Player.Die : Die
Command.Level.Set.Random : Random Level
Command.Boss.Spawn : Boss Spawn
